name: Pagination
description: Page navigation controls for paginated content with configurable sibling and boundary pages

accessibility.screenReader: Root has role=navigation with 'Pagination' label. Current page uses aria-current=page. Previous/Next buttons are labeled. Disabled states are announced. Ellipsis elements are hidden from screen readers.

recommendedUsage: Use for navigating through paginated lists, search results, or table data. Configure siblingCount and boundaryCount to balance visibility and compactness.
antiPatterns: Do not use for infinite scroll interfaces. Avoid hiding pagination when there's only one page. Consider virtual scrolling for very long lists instead of many pages.
